Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should council create a contest where 
member choose best Rpger, best 
character, best villian, best hero, etc? 

  o Yes 
  o No 
  o Yes... Hey I think that I've seen something like that before. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=972216  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
